This singleton class handles all database activities of Crawcial for Facebook.

This singleton class handles all database activities of Crawcial for Twitter.
dbProperties - Variable in class de.crawcial.facebook.FacebookStaticLoader.LoaderThread
 
de.crawcial - package de.crawcial
This is the main package of Crawcial.
de.crawcial.facebook - package de.crawcial.facebook
This package contains the components of Crawcial for Facebook.
de.crawcial.facebook.database - package de.crawcial.facebook.database
This package contains the database writer components of Crawcial for Facebook.
de.crawcial.facebook.gson - package de.crawcial.facebook.gson
This package contains the POJOs for Facebook Real Time Updates.
de.crawcial.twitter - package de.crawcial.twitter
This package contains the components of Crawcial for Twitter.
de.crawcial.twitter.database - package de.crawcial.twitter.database
This package contains the database writer components of Crawcial for Twitter.
de.crawcial.util - package de.crawcial.util
Crawcial utilities package.
de.crawcial.web.auth - package de.crawcial.web.auth
This package contains classes for the authentication processes of Crawcial.
de.crawcial.web.setup - package de.crawcial.web.setup
This package contains the required components for the setup of Crawcial.
de.crawcial.web.social - package de.crawcial.web.social
This package contains the core servlets for the social crawler components.
de.crawcial.web.util - package de.crawcial.web.util
Crawcial web utilities package.

doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.auth.AuthServlet
This method controls the logout flow.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.auth.FbAuth
This method handles the Facebook OAuth callback and sets the fbtoken cookie.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.auth.TwAuth
This method handles the Twitter OAuth callback and sets the twtoken cookie.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.setup.Updateconfig
Checks for the database configuration and redirects to the homepage of Crawcial.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.social.FbServlet
Enables Crawcial on Facebook pages and handles Facebook Callback verifications.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.social.TwServlet
Prefills the terms field of Crawcial for Twitter with the current world wide trends.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.auth.AuthServlet
This method controls the login flow.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.auth.FbAuth
This method checks the configuration status and redirects to the configuration page, if necessary.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.auth.TwAuth
This method checks for the required configuration and controls the Twitter login process.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.auth.UserServlet
Handles the user management API of Crawcial, adds or removes user.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.setup.Updateconfig
Handles the setup process, checks for existing configuration and errors.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.social.FbServlet
Enables Callbacks for Crawcial as a Facebook consumer, loads page contents on demand and handles Facebook Callbacks.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.social.TwServlet
Configures and starts TwitterStreamer or shuts it down.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.crawcial.web.util.Tokenmanager
Updates the social token configuration document in the Crawcial control database.
downloadPage(String, CouchDbProperties) - Method in class de.crawcial.facebook.FacebookStaticLoader
Invokes the download process.
